alert.note: Alert for Frio; Medina; Uvalde; Zavala (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 11:15PM CDT until June 03 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Medina County in south central Texas... Southeastern Uvalde County in south central Texas... Northeastern Zavala County in south central Texas... Western Frio County in south central Texas... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1114 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Uvalde, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Uvalde, Pearsall, Devine, Dilley, Batesville, Sabinal, Natalia, North Pearsall, Moore, Knippa, Derby, Hilltop, Washer, Biry, Uvalde Estates, Yancey, Divot, Bluff, Frio Town and Three Oaks. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
